## UI pages # LPUI.WebHome LPUI.WebHome.title=Learning materials
# BaseElementSheet BaseElementSheet.documentation.title=Description of the activity BaseElementSheet.documentation.empty=There is no documentation for this artifact. BaseElementSheet.organization.title=Organization BaseElementSheet.feedback.helper=If you think the content of this page has errors, please fill a note that will be sent to the responsible of this process.
# FeedbackSheet FeedbackSheet.title=Feedback on "{0}" FeedbackSheet.goback=Go back to the artifact
# CollaborativeDocumentSheet CollaborativeDocumentSheet.title=Collaborative Document on "{0}" CollaborativeDocumentSheet.validate=Validate
# Recommendation panel RecommendationPanel.role.title=Role RecommendationPanel.role.norecommendation=No recommended role RecommendationPanel.experts.title=Experts RecommendationPanel.experts.norecommendation=No recommended expert RecommendationPanel.learningmaterials.title=Learning Materials RecommendationPanel.learningmaterials.norecommendation=No recommended learning material
# Simulation Environment SimulationEnvironment.goback=Go back to the browsing of the model
## Macros # Workflow buttons macro WorkflowButtonsMacro.previous=Previous steps WorkflowButtonsMacro.next=Next steps WorkflowButtonsMacro.poollane=List of elements
# Organization macro OrganizationMacro.title=Organization units OrganizationMacro.title.top=Part of OrganizationMacro.title.bottom=Element of
# Weaving Button macro WeavingButtonMacro.title=Cross-model
## Livetables # Model sets livetable lpcode.livetable.modelset.emptyvalue=- lpcode.livetable.modelset.id=ID lpcode.livetable.modelset.name=Course name lpcode.livetable.modelset.doc.date=Last update lpcode.livetable.modelset._actions=Actions # Models livetable lpcode.livetable.model.emptyvalue=- lpcode.livetable.model.id=ID lpcode.livetable.model.name=Model name lpcode.livetable.model.type=Type lpcode.livetable.model.doc.date=Last update lpcode.livetable.model._actions=Actions
